EmailTemplate.subject: Free Technical Webinar: Explore Wheels & Brakes Maintenance Practices
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Tech Tips Webinar: Explore Wheels & Brakes Maintenance Practices Please join us... Date May 22, 2018
Time 11am-12pm EDT (UTC -4)
Location Free Webinar - Register and Attend <https://honeywell.webcasts.com/starthere.jsp?ei=1186584&tp_key=9434510c3c>
Curious about recent and future product improvements that will help you extend the life of your Airbus A380, A340 and A330 wheels & brakes components? We are always striving to improve the maintenance and repair required for parts such as the bearing cup and axle sleeves, while also simplifying your upgrade options (A330/340 2612202-4 to -6). Please join Bruce Gordy, a Honeywell product support expert, to explore best practices and published service information to improve product reliability. He will also review a snug/angle procedure. Register and attend here <[[https://honeywell.webcasts.com/starthere.jsp?ei=1186584&tp_key=9434510c3c]]>.
CLICK HERE TO REGISTER AND ATTEND <[[https://honeywell.webcasts.com/starthere.jsp?ei=1186584&tp_key=9434510c3c]]>
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Visit MyAerospace <[[http://www.myaerospace.honeywell.com]]>
